title: Banned after being hacked.
body:
So on the 15th I received a email from Google stating that someone has my password and attempted to login into my account so I proceeded to changed my Google password. My Gmail and league account had the same password, I didn't think to check my league account until when I tried to play and it told that I was logged in on another computer, this took place on the 19th. I've haven't played on nobody computer so I knew someone had my account at that point. I changed the password and email on my league account and everything was fine after doing so but I work a lot so can't play so much. I didn't even play a game after recovering my account I just left the client open. Until today I got a email stating that my account was banned. I created a support ticket and explained it in the ticket and even sent a screenshot of the email from Google that someone had my password to show my Gmail associated with my league account was compromised.

Is there anything else I should do? I even stated that my match history is champions I don't even play seeing as I only play adc/sup.

replies.body: We can help with this!  Putting in a ticket was the best step to assist with recovery.  I also recommend checking out our[ account protection](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751664-Protecting-Your-Account) guide just to help tune up your security settings inside and out of League.  We'll reply back to your ticket as soon as we can, just hang tight.
How long does it typically take to get a reply seeing as it's been well over 24hrs?
Our current volume has gone up a big over the last few days.  Toss me your ticket number, and I'd be happy to check on the status for you!
Okay, thank you. I'll be sure to check out the protection guide for sure.

I'd also advocate a password save, like KeePassX.

That way it doesn't matter if you forget one thus making it easier to use a different one for each account.
